sys:positions.title: Newa State Committee

description: Jhakku Prasad Subedi is a Nepalese politician belonging to the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) and is a teacher by profession. He was formerly the Chairman of the Rolpa District Development Committee before being arrested in 1996. After his release in 1998, he became a member of the United Revolutionary People's Council in 2001. In the 2008 Constituent Assembly election, he won the Kathmandu-2 seat, defeating Madhav Kumar Nepal.
short_description: Jhakku Prasad Subedi is a Nepalese politician from the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) and a former teacher, who served in the Constituent Assembly.
